name: Homunculus (stbo)
description:
This is a short little RPG Maker game I made for the Game Jam. It's about a bratty Princess who is in dire need of a good spanking, but doing so is highly illegal. Her frustrated father, King Leo, had already planned for this though. Through the use of some ancient magic passed down through their lineage, he has a loophole.

The game features Xbox-style controller support.

A = Enter

X = Run

B = Cancel

Y = Menu
